widgets.title: Daily Active Users
widgets.query: SELECT toDate(event_time) AS date, uniq(user_id) AS dau FROM events WHERE event_date >= today() - 7 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

widgets.title: Events by Type
widgets.query: SELECT event_name, count() AS count FROM events WHERE event_date >= today() - 7 GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Total Events (7d)
widgets.query: SELECT count() AS total FROM events WHERE event_date >= today() - 7

widgets.title: Unique Users (7d)
widgets.query: SELECT uniq(user_id) AS users FROM events WHERE event_date >= today() - 7
